title: Kalista:  Changing Oathsworn when players AFK
body:
While recently playing a game of ARAM as {{champion:429}} , my Oathsworn {{champion:19}} went afk.  I knew ahead of time that Oathsworn is a permanent ability, but i could not anticipate the player to go AFK.  With {{champion:19}} AFK i basically lost an entire ability out of my kit.  

My question is, since the game is able to recognize AFK players (as indicated by the match results screen where the X appears over the player icon), is there any way to implement a minor fix to allow players to purchase a second {{item:3599}}  and reassign Oathsworn when the first player goes AFK?  (as an anti-abuse mechanic you could have it auto-reassign to the first Oathsworn if they ever reconnect)

replies.body: Yea that's happened to me a couple times as well. You *can* rebuy The Black Spear which will let you rebind to someone else, but I believe there's a 3 min timer at the moment. As in, you would need to rebuy it within 3 minutes of the game starting.

with ARAM though you can' repurchase unless you die.  So i would either have to suicide, or stay with what i have.  Also, what about when they go afk after the 3min mark?  Like when someone thinks the game is unwinnable and gives up halfway through.
